Representative Reviews.Review: Best app for Indian stocks, mutual funds and foreign stocks. All in one app.

Indmoney provide lot of advanced features that your investment or trading journey more easy. This app interface very attractive . This app very fast . IND Money is a all in online solution for stock market. . 20.08.25 IND Money new update for Indian Stocks very impressive . 20.11.25 New update regarding watchlist is good.

Please Fix these issues otherwise great app. 1. when I open a stocks chart it initially show the previous stocks chart I had opened instead of the current stock. Perhaps a delay in the api call is happening tell the tech team to solve it. 2. When a see an option of buying or selling below a stock chart , when I change the option from delivery to intraday it should also show stoploss option there itself,I need to go back to the positions options and add SL which is quite inconvenient.

I have been using this app for a while time the app is so good comparing with other... And FO is also entry and exit with real time price.. What A app and what a apps team technical and customer Really want to say just within a week my problem was resolved against the UPI thankyou team for taking my difficult as serious and give me the best response as soon as you can with resolving it... Wonderful App with the Wonderful team support

junk app and worst ever support team, just for sake of norms they update tickets without any helpful progress on actual issue. i want to give negative rating. They are still playing with customer deposit money without crediting to wallet, I have initiated deposit of 2L on 30Oct, till now it is not yet credited to my wallet, first they said 6Nov, now they are saying it will take upto 12Nov my tkt2852554, what are they doing with customers money? dont use this app for your investment plans

I used the INDmoney app to complete a mobile recharge, but the recharge was not processed. It has been over 48 hours, and the status is still showing as pending. However, the amount has already been deducted from my account. I tried waiting, but nothing has been updated. This is very disappointing and inconvenient. Please resolve this issue as soon as possible and improve the recharge service worst app dont use this app my sincere request

i have been using this app on my device for years and suddenly after updating it says that device is rooted or compromised. Before update it was working now it is not opening fix this please. I havent rooted my mobile and there is no virus on my mobile.

Giving 3 stars, because sometimes the app doesnt support UPI payments and says to update to the latest version or to reopen the app, even though the app is at the latest version. Even after reopening the app the same message is displayed and I cant make any UPI payments. Please resolve this issue by providing a new version for this app.

No, something is not working at your end, please check.
